title: Team Collaboration Visualization Map Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education theories and understanding of group dynamics
context.additional_context: A job competency enhancement program for pre-service/in-service teachers, focusing on smartphone-based language education in a constrained technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze textual signals (emphasis/highlighting) to identify core elements of a team collaboration map with 80% accuracy.
Learners can successfully create a hierarchical visualization map through collaboration with team members based on given text at least twice out of three attempts.
Learners can compare differences in collaborative outputs based on the presence or absence of hyperlinks and write a report explaining optimal text signal strategies with over 70% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
